title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added social login (Google) authentication support for GitHub accounts, including sign-up, sign-in, and sudo mode verification.
Updated authentication documentation to include social login options and limitations (free and enterprise cloud only).
Added mobile app sign-in instructions for social login users (Android and iOS).
Synced secret scanning patterns with new Azure and Buildkite token types.
summary:
- Added social login (Google) authentication support for GitHub accounts, including sign-up, sign-in, and sudo mode verification.
- Updated authentication documentation to include social login options and limitations (free and enterprise cloud only).
- Added mobile app sign-in instructions for social login users (Android and iOS).
- Added `ChangeType.DirectiveUsageFieldDefinitionRemoved` to GraphQL changelog reporting.
- Synced secret scanning patterns with new Azure and Buildkite token types.
generated_title: Add social login authentication and update secret scanning patterns

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added social login (Google) authentication support for GitHub accounts, including sign-up, sign-in, and sudo mode verification.
- Updated authentication documentation to include social login options and limitations (free and enterprise cloud only).
- Added mobile app sign-in instructions for social login users (Android and iOS).
- Added `ChangeType.DirectiveUsageFieldDefinitionRemoved` to GraphQL changelog reporting.
- Synced secret scanning patterns with new Azure and Buildkite token types.

### Title
Add social login authentication and update secret scanning patterns
